Customer care Get answers to your questions Contact Us Return Policy Privacy Policy Terms of Use VCDPA Compliance CCPA Compliance Account & Ordering Get the information you need My Account Ordering Policy Shipping Policy International Orders Merchandise Inquiries Explore MiLB Learn more about us MiLB.com MiLBStore.com MiLB Auctions MiLB.TV MiLB Tickets MiLB Team Stores Follow Us DAYTONATORTUGAS.COM About Us Welcome to the Official Online Store of the Daytona Tortugas, the Single-A Minor League Baseball Affiliate of the Cincinnati Reds. Merchandise for the Daytona Tortugas Official Store is provided in an effort to offer the most extensive selection of officially licensed Daytona Tortugas products on the internet. The Daytona Tortugas Official Store is located at 110 E. Orange Avenue Daytona Beach, FL, 32114. For questions regarding merchandise and order status please call the Daytona Tortugas Official Store directly at (386) 257-3172 or email tugamerch@daytonatortugas.com For more team information please visit http://www.daytonatortugas.com , the official website of the Daytona Tortugas. Thank you for supporting the Daytona Tortugas. Entertainment Venues Transportation Services Statement of Accessibility ADA Accessibility Feedback Form Partner Gateway Partner Resources About Our Organization Share Our Team The Daytona Beach Convention and Visitors Bureau (CVB) works with area tourism and hospitality-related businesses, non-profit organizations, and event promoters, to represent the area to potential travelers, tour operators, travel agents, meeting planners, and the travel media. The CVB staff of marketing, sales, communication and administration professionals act in accordance with initiatives outlined by the Halifax Area Advertising Authority (HAAA). ADMINISTRATION Administration is responsible for the overall management and operations of the CVB as well as Finance and Human Resource services. Staff Lori Campbell Baker , APR, CDME, Executive Director Chuck Grimes , Director of Finance Steven Pike , HR/Finance DESTINATION SALES Working closely with meeting planners, tour and travel operators, and sports groups, the Group Sales Department helps to recruit and coordinate with area partners to provide services for group meetings, citywide conventions, trade shows, and sports competition events to the destination. The CVB is an active member of many industry professional associations and promotes the area's meeting facilities and hotels at industry events worldwide. Staff Brenda Redmon , Director of Sales Brandon Little , Senior Sales Manager, Sports Business Development Mara Robin , Corporate Sales Manager Shannon Echemendia , Sales Manager Karen DiGiacomo , Tour & Travel Sales Manager Rashanda Denson , Group Sales Coordinator Gabriela Amado , Convention Services and Events Coordinator MARKETING & DESIGN This division of the CVB handles advertising, marketing, tourism event funding, consumer promotions, visitor information services and business development. Staff Kay Galloway , TMP, Chief Marketing Officer Jennifer Sims , CHIA, CAHTA, Marketing Systems Manager Tangela Boyd , Digital Marketing Manager Connor Rand , Partner Liaison & Tourism Affairs Brian Bentley , PDM, Manager of Corporate Partnerships and Events Ashley Mesmer , Digital Content Creator COMMUNICATIONS This division of the CVB focuses on media relations, travel journalist press trips, editorial and online content, event calendar, brand and message consistency, community relations, speaker's bureau and crisis communications. Staff Andrew Booth , Director of Communications Sharon Harlow , Communications Specialist, Community Outreach View Our Destination Guide SIGN UP FOR OUR eNewsletter About Our Organization Halifax Area Advertising Authority Committees Market and Investor Research Newsletters Tourism Partner Resources Tourism Events Funding Filming in Daytona Beach Contact Sitemap Privacy Policy Accessibility Things to Do Beach Accessibility Dining Entertainment Venues Transportation Services Statement of Accessibility ADA Accessibility Feedback Form Partner Gateway Partner Resources © 2025 Daytona Beach Area CVB © 2025 Daytona Beach Area CVB
